trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Middletown
There were no other sightings in Middletown on or around July 23rd 2003
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: alien creature ran across road in front of car.
divs: sighting details1. traveling north on rt. 154, towards home. 2. running across road, nearly came to a comlete stop to avoid hitting it. 3. a kangaroo-esque\dinosaur like creature 4. a kangaroo-esque\dinosaur like creature, running for all it was worth, from west to east, across road. it was flesh toned, hairless, human type skin, large round dark sad eyes. large tail, hairless, kept pointed upward. very large hips, like sitting kangaroo, but was running, not hopping. small arms moved to and fro as it ran. around 2-2.5ft tall. turned and looked at car, then kept running. hands were in fists. 5. too shocked to remember detailed features of body and face, may have had teeth. came home and told family of event immediately. 6. ran into cover of woods
